Utilization Class

Source: R/end_affiliations.R
proUtilization.Rd

Utilization Class

Usage

proUtilization(
  npi = NULL,
  pac = NULL,
  last_name = NULL,
  first_name = NULL,
  middle_name = NULL,
  suffix = NULL,
  procedure = NULL,
  count = NULL,
  percentile = NULL
)

Arguments

npi

<chr> 10-digit Individual NPI

pac

<chr> 10-digit PECOS Associate Control (PAC) ID

first_name, middle_name, last_name, suffix

<chr> Individual provider's name

procedure

<chr> Procedure category

count

<int> Number of procedures performed

percentile

<int> Percentile of procedures performed

Value

An S7 <proUtilization> object.

Examples

proUtilization(last_name = "CURRY")
#> <proUtilization>
#>  @ args    : Named chr [1:3] "provider_last_name" "=" "CURRY"
#>  .. - attr(*, "names")= chr [1:3] "conditions[0][property]" "conditions[0][operator]" "conditions[0][value]"
#>  @ request :List of 8
#>  .. $ url     : chr "https://data.cms.gov/provider-data/api/1/datastore/query/n0yb-util/0?count=false&format=json&keys=true&limit=20"| __truncated__
#>  .. $ method  : NULL
#>  .. $ headers : list()
#>  .. $ body    : NULL
#>  .. $ fields  : list()
#>  .. $ options : list()
#>  .. $ policies:List of 1
#>  ..  ..$ throttle_realm: chr "data.cms.gov"
#>  .. $ state   :<environment: 0x5607b87e7810> 
#>  .. - attr(*, "class")= chr "httr2_request"
#>  @ count   : int 44
#>  @ response:'data.frame':	44 obs. of  10 variables:
#>  .. $ npi                      : chr  "1033205539" "1043427172" "1043427172" "1073711388" ...
#>  .. $ ind_pac_id               : chr  "8325104946" "5890842181" "5890842181" "7517135015" ...
#>  .. $ provider_last_name       : chr  "CURRY" "CURRY" "CURRY" "CURRY" ...
#>  .. $ provider_first_name      : chr  "ROBERT" "JOSEPH" "JOSEPH" "TRAVIS" ...
#>  .. $ provider_middle_name     : chr  "EUGENE" "M" "M" "" ...
#>  .. $ suff                     : chr  "" "" "" "" ...
#>  .. $ procedure_category       : chr  "Hernia repair - groin (open)" "Upper gastrointestinal (GI) endoscopy for acid reflux" "Melanoma (skin cancer) excision" "Hip replacement" ...
#>  .. $ count                    : chr  "1-10" "13" "21" "75" ...
#>  .. $ percentile               : chr  "" "41" "75" "95" ...
